attributes.action: asign the Angel gardens FC pub side, Norwich, Norfolk represents great Britain in the 2008 olympics football competition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Angel Gardens FC is a sunday league football team who are fighting hard in a tough 1a league.  They should represent team Great Britain in the next olympics as they are a talented and respectful team that can really do something special for the nation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
